Directions: In a large saucepan, bring cranberries and water to a boil.  Reduce heat; simmer for 5-7 minutes or until berries pop.  Stir in the remaining ingredients; return to a boil.  Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 25-30 minutes.  Strain through cheesecloth; discard pulp and cinnamon sticks.  Serve warm.
Ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package fresh or frozen cranberries
